sentences.en: Although It'seems to us that we will likely capitulate soon.
sentences.cn: 不过在我们看来,目前距离投降式抛售可能不远.

sentences.en: Helen finally capitulated and let her son have a car.
sentences.cn: 海伦最终让步，同意让儿子买一辆车。

sentences.en: The appealing tone of Ishmasl Young's voice made Collins capitulate.
sentences.cn: 伊斯梅尔·杨恳求的口吻使柯林斯让步了.

sentences.en: The enemy was warned to capitulate or face annihilation.
sentences.cn: 敌人受到警告,要么投降,要么全部被歼灭.

sentences.en: The jade is so stout she won't capitulate nor yield upon any terms.
sentences.cn: 这丫头固执极了,她不肯答应,什么条件都不行.

sentences.en: Watching an insipid and familiarly witless England side capitulate to Spain, those other European rank underachievers?
sentences.cn: 去看英国队向欧洲足球的落后生西班牙队缴械投降 吗 ?

sentences.en: We will never capitulate to pressure from outside.
sentences.cn: 我们永远不会屈服于外界的压力.

sentences.en: When I came to him he began to capitulate with me.
sentences.cn: 当我碰到他时,他便开始同我磋商.
